1.1.5.name: connect20/Affinity_Items
1.1.5.description: Increase your sales with new generation personalized recommendations: affinity items automatically displays to each visitor, on each page, the selection of products that best fits his/her tastes & needs. Give your customer an unrivaled experience with our real time multilingual algorithms. Use the most advanced personalization service on a success-based pricing.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
